strokes.description: Adding bouncy wave pattern above existing curves to enhance the playful dancing motion

parsed_instruction.reasoning: The existing orange circles and swooping curves suggest a lighthearted, bouncing movement. I chose 'playful' as the mood because of this dynamic, carefree quality. Using the wiggle brush with medium speed creates organic, dancing lines that complement the existing elements. The wave pattern mirrors and enhances the playful bounce of the composition, making it feel like a joyful choreography of shapes and movement.
